joinUsSubtitle: We sincerely invite talents passionate about computational chemistry to join our team and explore the frontiers of science together.
contactUsDescription: If you are interested in our research or recruitment, please feel free to contact us. We will respond to your inquiry as soon as possible.

publicationsDesc: Our research group has achieved a series of research results in the field of computational chemistry.
projectsDesc: Our research group is dedicated to cutting-edge research in the field of computational chemistry.
labIntro: State Key Laboratory of Supramolecular Structure and Materials
newsDescription: Learn about the latest developments, research progress, academic activities and collaboration information of our lab.
labDescription: We specializes in the multi-scale simulation of polymer materials, integrating experimental validation and artificial intelligence algorithms to address key scientific challenges in the field of soft matter.
recruitmentParagraph: We recruit master's students, doctoral students, and postdoctoral fellows. We require applicants to have degrees in chemistry, physics, biology, or related fields, with strong interest in scientific research and commitment to academic careers. We can provide excellent research environment, advanced experimental facilities, professional guidance team, and promising development prospects.
